articles.description: According to a latest RBI data, for most private-sector companies the capex activity has remained subdued, with the focus being on building up cash reserves. Many large corporates had made big investment announcements during peak bull market. Are recent globa…

articles.title: RBI Imposes Penalties On 3 Cooperative Banks Over Non-Compliance - NDTV
articles.description: The Reserve Bank in a statement said it has imposed penalty on three cooperatives banks for deficiencies in regulatory compliance. The three cooperative banks include, The Maharashtra State Co-operative Bank; The Nasik Merchant's Co-operative Bank;
articles.content:
Rs 50 lakh fine has been imposed against The Nasik Merchant's Co-operative Bank.
Mumbai: The Reserve Bank on Monday said it has imposed penalty on three cooperatives banks, including Maharashtra-bas… [+1106 chars]

articles.author: Shruti Menon
articles.title: Ashneer Grover Sets Up New Startup Third Unicorn To ‘Disrupt Another Sector’ - The Quint
articles.description: Ashneer Grover, co-founder of BharatPe, and his wife, Madhuri Jain, have set up a new company called Third Unicorn, according to the Tofler database. The company was founded on 6 July 2022, just a few months the couple's dramatic exit from BharatPe.
articles.content:
Then, BharatPe revealed that an internal investigation had found Grover, and certain members of his family guilty of financial fraud.
"The Grover family and their relatives engaged in extensive misa… [+805 chars]

articles.title: Anand Mahindra Replies To Question On Tata Motors With "Competition Spurs Innovation" Tweet, Wins Internet - NDTV
articles.description: Last week, Anand Mahindra was trending on Twitter for his response to a user's question if he is an NRI.
articles.content:
Anand Mahindra often interacts with his followers on Twitter.
